en: I am!

en: If there is something you don't understand, then ask.

en: Is he a doctor?
Don't you think it's strange that he's not here?

en: She is very happy.
I can't understand why he did that.

en: He departed without so much as saying good bye.

en: I wish you had come with us.

en: Don't trust a man whose past you know nothing about.
pinyin: Bu4 yao4 xiang1xin4 yi1 ge4 ni3 yi1dian3 dou1 bu4 liao3jie3 ta1 guo4qu4 de5 ren2.

en: Mmm, but you must wait for me.

en: I don't know whether he is dead or alive.

en: Don't you have to work?

en: Are you alright?
pinyin: Ni3 hai2hao3 ba5?

en: What are you going to do when the one you love does not love you.
pinyin: Dang1 ni3 ai4 de5 ren2 bu4 ai4 ni3 zen3me5ban4?

en: That's the reason she doesn't want to be with him anymore.
pinyin: Zhe4 jiu4 shi4 ta1 wei4shen2me5 bu4 yuan4yi4 zai4 gen1 ta1 zai4yi1qi3 de5 yuan2yin1.

en: I think we should talk about this now.
pinyin: Wo3 ren4wei2 wo3men5 xian4zai4 jiu4 gai1 tan2tan2 zhe4 shi4.

en: How could so many people go along with this?
pinyin: Zen3me5 hui4 you3 zhe4me5 duo1 de5 ren2 tong2yi4 ne5?

en: Did you hear what I said?

en: I want to speak.

en: You guys looked mad.

en: How could it be done without my knowing?

en: All my friends will be there.

en: You must help him
My father gets along with his friends.

en: This month really flew by without me doing anything at all.
pinyin: Zhe4ge5 yue4 wo3 zhen1 de5 shen2me5 dou1 mei2 zuo4 jiu4 jie2shu4 le5.

en: I am Armenian.

en: He left the house without saying goodbye.

en: The girl waiting for that boy is a friend of mine.
pinyin: Ta1 zai4 deng3 de5 na4ge5 nan2hai2 shi4 wo3 de5 yi1 ge4 peng2you5.

en: She is the one who feeds our dog.
pinyin: Ta1 shi4 wei4 wo3men5 de5 gou3 de5 ren2.

en: What I'm about to say is strictly between you and me.
pinyin: Wo3 yao4 gao4su5 ni3 de5 zhi3neng2 ni3wo3 zhi1dao4.

en: I have something I want to say to you.
pinyin: Wo3 you3dian3 hua4 xiang3 gen1 ni3 shuo1.

en: He did not think he needed their protection.

en: She might know that we are here.

en: Thanks. If there's anything else, just ask.
pinyin: Xie4xie5. Hai2 you3 qi2ta1 shen2me5 de5 hua4 lai2 wen4 wo3 ba5.

en: I'm sure that she will come back soon.
pinyin: Wo3 ken3ding4 ta1 hen3 kuai4 jiu4 hui4 hui2lai5 de5.

en: I'll get you something nice.
pinyin: Wo3 hui4 gei3 dian3 ni3hao3 dong1xi5.

en: I'm not a doctor.
pinyin: Wo3 bu4 shi4 yi1sheng1

en: Do you think they followed us here?
pinyin: Ni3 ren4wei2 ta1men5 gen1zhe5 wo3men5 dao4 zhe4li3 le5 ma5?

en: He betrayed her secret to his friends.
pinyin: Ta1 ba3 ta1 de5 mi4mi4 gao4su5 le5 ta1 de5 peng2you5.

en: Can you please shut up?
pinyin: Ni3 ke3yi3 bi4zui3 ma5?

en: I don't remember doing anything like that.
pinyin: Wo3 bu4 ji4de5 gan4 le5 na4yang4 de5 shi4qing5.

en: No matter what you may say, I will not change my mind.
pinyin: Ni3 shuo1 shen2me5 wo3 ye3 bu4 hui4 gai3bian4 zhu3yi5 de5.

en: Go and find out!
I found the key for which I had been looking.

en: Were you serious about that?
pinyin: Ni3 dui4 na4shi5 ren4zhen1 de5 ma5?

en: My dear mother.
pinyin: Wo3 qin1'ai4 de5 ma1ma5

en: I should go to bed.

en: It has nothing to do with me.
pinyin: Ta1 gen1 wo3 mei2guan1xi5.

en: Somebody's in here.

en: I wonder what happened to his sister.
pinyin: Wo3 xiang3 zhi1dao4 ta1 zi3zi3 fa1sheng1 le5 shen2me5shi4.

en: Sometimes, I don't understand him.
pinyin: You3shi2 wo3 zhen1 de5 bu4 zhi1dao4 ta1 zai4 xiang3 shen2me5.

en: We had better sit down here.
pinyin: Wo3men5 hai2shi5 zai4 zhe4li3 zuo4xia5 ba5.

en: I want to marry a girl like her.
pinyin: Wo3 xiang3 he2 yi1 ge4 xiang4 ta1 nei4yang4 de5 nv3hai2 jie2hun1.

en: It's fine, just make sure you don't say that again.
pinyin: Mei2guan1xi5, yi3hou4 bu4 zhe4me5 shuo1 jiu4 hao3 le5.

en: I think you will have done all the work soon.
pinyin: Wo3 xiang3 ni3 hen3 kuai4 jiu4 ke3yi3 zuo4wan2 suo3you3 de5 gong1zuo4.

en: She did it all by herself.
pinyin: Na4 quan2dou1 shi4 ta1 yi1ge4ren2 zuo4 de5.

en: Will you sell your car to me?
pinyin: Ni3 ke3yi3 ba3 ni3 de5 che1 mai4 gei3 wo3 ma5?

en: You're lucky to have such a good job.
pinyin: Ni3 hen3 xing4yun4 neng2 you3 zhe4me5 hao3 de5 gong1zuo4.

en: I haven't yet eaten anything today.
pinyin: Wo3 jin1tian1 hai2 sha2 ye3 mei2 chi1 ne5.

en: Everybody says I look like my father.
pinyin: Mei3ge5ren2 dou1 shuo1 wo3 kan4qi3lai5 xiang4 wo3 ba4ba5.

en: I've already told him that.
pinyin: Wo3 zao3jiu4 he2 ta1 shuo1 guo5 zhe4xie1 le5.

en: I don't know what you're referring to.
pinyin: Wo3 bu4 zhi1dao4 ni3 zhi3 de5 shi4 shen2me5.

en: Why didn't you dance with him?
pinyin: Ni3 wei4shen2me5 bu4 gen1 ta1 tiao4wu3 ne5?

en: You can't live on this side anymore.
pinyin: Ni3 bu4 neng2 zai4 zhu4 zai4 zhe4bian1 le5.

en: Very happy to meet you.
pinyin: Ren4shi5 ni3 hen3 gao1xing4

en: You are the most beautiful girl I have ever seen.
pinyin: Ni3 shi4 wo3 jian4 guo5 de5 zui4 piao4liang5 de5 nv3hai2.

en: I promised him that I'd come today.
pinyin: Wo3 da1ying5 guo5 ta1 jin1tian1 hui4 lai2.

en: I just wish we could leave this horrible place.
pinyin: Wo3 zhi3shi4 xi1wang4 wo3men5 neng2 li2kai1 zhe4ge5 ke3pa4 de5 di4fang5.

en: Do you care what they think?
pinyin: Ni3 guan1xin1 ta1men5 zai4 xiang3 shen2me5 ma5?

en: We should tell children how to protect themselves.
pinyin: Wo3men5 ying1gai1 gao4su5 hai2zi5 zen3me5 bao3hu4 zi4ji3.

en: She gave me some good advice.
pinyin: Ta1 gei3 le5 wo3 yi1xie1 hen3 hao3 de5 jian4yi4.

en: It's nice to be back.
pinyin: Hen3 gao1xing4 hui2lai5

en: I want to show you something in my office.
pinyin: Wo3 xiang3 gei3 ni3 kan4kan5 wo3 ban4gong1shi4 li3 de5 yi1xie1 dong1xi5.

en: She always lets her children do what they want to.
pinyin: Ta1 zong3shi4 rang4 zi4ji3 de5 xiao3hai2 zuo4zi4ji3 xiang3 zuo4 de5 shi4.

en: I wish we could spend more time together.
pinyin: Wo3 xi1wang4 wo3men5 you3 geng4 duo1 shi2jian1 dai1 zai4yi1qi3.

en: Now's the time to decide whether you really want to get married or not.
pinyin: Xian4zai4 shi4 ni3 jue2ding4 shi4bu4shi4 zhen1 yao4 jie2hun1 de5 shi2hou5.

en: It's no use telling me anything.
pinyin: Dui4 wo3 shuo1 shen2me5 dou1 shi4 mei2yong4 de5.

en: Do you want to get married first or have a child first?
pinyin: Ni3 xiang3 wo3men5 xian1 jie2hun1 hai2shi5 xian1sheng5 hai2zi5?

en: He explained his plan both to my son and to me.
pinyin: Ta1 ba3 ta1 de5 da3suan4 jie3shi4 le5 gei3 wo3 he2 wo3 de5 er2zi5 liang3 ge4ren2 ting1.

en: I think it's you who should apologize to her.
pinyin: Wo3 jue2de5 ying1gai1 xiang4 ta1 dao4qian4 de5 ren2 shi4 ni3.

en: They must really hate me.
pinyin: Ta1men5 yi1ding4 hen3 tao3yan4 wo3

en: Sorry, I don't agree with you.
We no longer need you.

en: Ask him where he parked his car.
pinyin: Wen4 ta1 ba3 ta1 zi4ji3 de5 che1 ting2 zai4 na3li3 le5.

en: They showed me a lot of beautiful photos.
pinyin: Ta1men5 gei3 wo3 kan4 le5 hen3 duo1 piao4liang5 de5 zhao4pian4.

en: What exactly happened to you?
pinyin: Ni3 dao4di3 zen3me5hui2shi4 a1?

en: I think the job's very occupying.
pinyin: Wo3 jue2de5 gong1zuo4 hen3 mang2

en: He left the room without so much as saying good-bye to me.
pinyin: Ta1 lian2 zai4jian4 ye3 mei2 shuo1 jiu4 li2kai1 le5 fang2jian1.

en: The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.
pinyin: Zui4 hou4 yi1 ge4 ting1 wo3 shuo1 wo3 de5 zhu3yi5 de5 ren2 ren4wei2 wo3 feng1 le5.

en: What on earth are you doing in my room?
pinyin: Ni3 dao4di3 zai4 wo3 fang2jian1 li3 gan4 shen2me5?

en: Which one of these people is your friend?
pinyin: Zhe4xie1 ren2 qi2zhong1 na3yi1ge5 shi4 ni3 de5 peng2you5?

en: Is there any difference between your idea and hers?
pinyin: Ni3 de5 xiang3fa3 he2 ta1 de5 xiang3fa3 you3 shen2me5 bu4 tong2 ma5?

en: He promised me to pay back the money.
pinyin: Ta1 xiang4 wo3 bao3zheng4 hui4 hai2 qian2.

en: They married when they were young.
pinyin: Ta1men5 zai4 hai2 hen3 nian2qing1 de5 shi2hou5 jiu4 jie2hun1 le5.

en: No one knows what'll happen in the future.
pinyin: Mei2you3 ren2 zhi1dao4 wei4lai2 hui4 fa1sheng1 shen2me5shi4.

en: As soon as I get paid I will pay you back.
pinyin: Wo3 yi1 shou1dao4 qian2 jiu4 ma3shang4 hai2 qian2 gei3 ni3.

en: Time passes quickly when we're doing something we like.
pinyin: Zai4 zuo4 xi3huan5 de5 shi4qing5 de5 shi2hou5 shi2jian1 guo4qu5 de5 hen3 kuai4.

en: I don't feel sorry for her.
pinyin: Wo3 jue2de5 ta1 yi1dian3 ye3 bu4 ke3lian2.

en: Today I'm going home.
pinyin: Jin1tian1 wo3 hui2jia1

en: Did she come here to relax?
pinyin: Ta1 lai2 zhe4li3 fang4song1 de5 ma5?

en: Nothing is really guaranteed.
pinyin: Mei2you3 shen2me5 shi4 zhen1zheng4 you3 bao3zheng4 de5.

en: What do you think of it?
No sooner had she caught sight of me than she started running in my direction.

en: She didn't go to watch movie.
It was a nice story.
pinyin: Zhe4 shi4 ge4 ting3hao3 de5 gu4shi5.

en: I don't think I like this game very much.
pinyin: Wo3 jue2de5 wo3 bu4 tai4 xi3huan5 zhe4 you2xi4.

en: I have no idea why he did that.
pinyin: Wo3 bu4 ming2bai5 ta1 wei4he2 gao3 zhe4yang4.

en: You have only to ask him if he'd like to join us.
pinyin: Ni3 zhi3yao4 wen4 ta1 xiang3 bu4 xiang3 jia1ru4 wo3men5 jiu4 ke3yi3 le5.

en: I don't believe you've met him.
pinyin: Wo3 bu4 xiang1xin4 ni3 yi3jing1 yu4dao4 le5 ta1.

en: I couldn't agree with you more.
pinyin: Wo3 zai4 tong2yi4 ni3 bu4guo4 le5.

en: I'm feeling better now, but I know that my father will still be very worried.

en: She wants to know who sent the flowers.

en: I wanted to thank you for what you did today.
